pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Interface for the 'STATcube' REST API and Open Government Data // Import data from the 'STATcube' REST API or from the open data portal of Statistics Austria. This package includes a client for API requests as well as parsing utilities for data which originates from 'STATcube'. Documentation about 'STATcubeR' is provided by several vignettes included in the package as well as on the public 'pkgdown' page at https://statistikat.github.io/STATcubeR/.
